attributes.action: Introduce mandatory ID cards for all people living in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: By introducing ID cards illegal immigration will be reduced along with illegal working
attributes.background: ID cards for everyone will allow quick and easy identification for all services. A lot of European countries already have these.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reintroduce UK National ID cards for British citizens.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700738
